title: Sales & Experience Specialist, Apple Vision Pro
summary: Imagine what you could do here. The people here at Apple don’t just create products — they create the kind of wonder that’s revolutionized entire industries.
description: The Enterprise Sales & Experience Specialist will be conducting and managing product and solution demos of the Apple Vision Pro to enterprise audiences. The key tasks include: Product features and solution demos, Sales Enablement, Executive Briefings for Apple Vision Pro, Technical architecture and management, Voice of the customer, Go-to-Market with Solution Partners, Solution Planning.
preferred_qualifications: 5+ years of technical sales or customer facing experience in technology solutions for business, Strong competency of Apple platforms and familiarity with Apple enterprise solution partner ecosystem, Deep knowledge and use of sales enablement mechanisms and methods, etc.
